description: '''Hipster hop''' (also known as '''hipster rap''') is a term that was used by music bloggers and critics in the 2000s and early 2010s to describe [[hip hop music]] that was perceived to be influenced by the [[Hipster (contemporary subculture)|hipster subculture]]. The term has been applied to artists such as [[The Cool Kids (duo)|The Cool Kids]] and [[Kid Cudi]], though it has not been embraced by such artists.
